==Controller, Request==

These functions are called from actions in your controller files.

Example (`controllers/Blog.cfc`):

{{{
<cffunction name="sendToWheels">
  <cfset redirectTo(url="http://www.cfwheels.com")>
</cffunction>
}}}

 * [redirectTo redirectTo()]
